casebody.data:
STATE of North Carolina
v.
Bertylar PEACE, Jr. No. 413P17 Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 5, 2018 Mr. Ben G. Irons, II, Attorney at Law, for Peace, Bertylar (Jr.) Ms. Christine Wright, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Mr. Bertylar Peace, Jr., for Peace, Bertylar (Jr.) Mr. Michael D. Waters, District Attorney, for State

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 11th of December 2017 by Defendant in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of April 2018."
